entry.title: Combined summary - bitcoin.org luke-jr/multiclient branch
entry.summary: The discussion revolves around a request to pull a project from Github that has been available for almost 20 days. The author proposes that the project should be pulled right away, and improvements can follow later, as debating trivial issues could lead to an anti-pattern. Mike Hearn suggests having four columns and X rows for each box with linkable titles, pictures, and an 850-word blurb from the project. He cites libbitcoin as an example of a circular peg that would not fit in the square boxes. The author expresses pleasure in seeing MultiBit, Electrum, and Armory getting exposure.In conclusion, the post invites anyone interested to add a specific IP address to their hosts file and visit http://bitcoin.org.
